SEARCH
Package tage.physics

Class PhysicsEngine

java.lang.Object
tage.physics.PhysicsEngine
public class PhysicsEngine extends Object
This is the TAGE wrapper for the LibBulletJme physics engine.
If using TAGE, this physics engine is automatically instantiated.
Author:
Scott Gordon, Roxanne Campbell, Alexander Bass (terrain mesh)

    • nextUID

      public int nextUID()
      Used by TAGE to generate IDs for physics objects.

    • detectCollisions

      public void detectCollisions()
      The application typically calls this function once every frame to enable accessing collision information for all objects. Results are stored in two data structures accessible from the physics objects:
      • an ArrayList of manifolds
      • a HashSet of physics objects that the particular object collided with
      The application should use the functions in PhysicsObject for accessing the collision results.
